conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: MERCUTIO, kinsman to the Prince, and friend to Romeo.
PARIS, a young Nobleman, kinsman to the Prince.
MONTAGUE, head of a Veronese family at feud with the Capulets.
BENVOLIO, nephew to Montague, and friend to Romeo.
CAPULET, head of a Veronese family at feud with the Montagues.
FRIAR JOHN, of the same Order.
Citizens of Verona; several Men and Women, relations to both houses;
During the greater part of the Play in Verona; once, in the
